item.title: Text Analysis Dashboard
item.description: name: text_mining fullname: Text Analysis Interactive Dashboard description: >An automated Text Analysis Interactive Dashboard template. Original Code By: Michael Sheppard. Adapted to the Rnssp Package by: Gbedegnon Roseric Azondekon. National Syndromic Surveillance Program (NSSP). Centers for Disease Control and Prevention (CDC). create_dir: true Detailed Description The Interactive Text Analysis Dashboard template (text_mining) summarizes the chief complaint text and discharge diagnosis codes as part of an initial description of the content of these fields.
